name: 方旭偉
objective: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
schedule:
(1-2)What are the transport phenomena
(3-4)Mathematics of vectors and tensors
(5-6)Newton’s law of viscosity
(7-8)Shell momentum balances
(9-10)Velocity distributions in laminar flow
(11-12)The equation of continuity
(13-14)Velocity distributions in turbulent flow
(15-16)Macroscopic balances for flow systems
(17-18)Behavior of polymeric liquids
materials:
1.“Introduction to Transport Phenomena” by W. J. Thomson, Prentice Hall, 2000.
2.“Transport Phenomena” by R.B. Bird, W.E. Stewart, and E.N. Lightfoot, 2nd edition, Wiley, 2002.
